CMFormatter.php

00001 <?php
00002 
00003 include_once("CMClass.php");
00004 
00010 class CMFormatter implements CMClass {
00011  
00017  private $format = false;
00018  
00025  public static $FormatDefault =
00026    array(
00027     'date' => '',
00028     'dec' => '.',
00029     'fixed' => false,
00030     'mul' => 1.0,
00031     'post' => '',
00032     'pre' => '',
00033     'prec' => 14,
00034     'sizes' => ' bytes; KB; MB; GB; TB; PB; EB; ZB; YB',
00035     'thousands' => '',
00036     'type' => 'string',
00037     'unit' => 1000
00038    );
00039  
00048  public function CMFormatter($type = 'string', $format = false) {
00049   $this->format = array();
00050   if(is_array($type)) {
00051    foreach($type as $k => $v)
00052     $this->format[$k] = CMFormatter::InitFormatter($v, $format);
00053   } else $this->format[0] = CMFormatter::InitFormatter($type, $format);
00054  }
00055  
00062  private static function InitFormatter($type, $format) {
00063   $r = CMFormatter::$FormatDefault;
00064   $r['type'] = $type;
00065   
00066   // check if this is short syntax
00067   if(strpos($r['type'], '|') !== false) {
00068    $r['type'] = substr($type, 0, strpos($r['type'], '|'));
00069    
00070    $ps = explode('|', substr($type, strpos($type, '|') + 1));
00071    foreach($ps as $p) {
00072     $pos = strpos($p, '=');
00073     if($pos === false)
00074      $r['date'] = $p;
00075     else $r[substr($p, 0, $pos)] = substr($p, $pos + 1);
00076    }
00077    
00078    return $r;
00079   }
00080   
00081   // bytes uses prec=1 by default
00082   if($r['type'] == 'bytes')
00083    $r['prec'] = 1;
00084   
00085   if(is_array($format)) {
00086    foreach($format as $k => $v)
00087     $r[$k] = $v;
00088   } else $r['date'] = $format;
00089   
00090   return $r;
00091  }
00092  
00102  public function getFormat() {
00103   return $this->format;
00104  }
00105  
00111  public function format($data) {
00112   // we have to remember this for the return
00113   $returnArray = is_array($data);
00114   if(!is_array($data))
00115    $data = array($data);
00116   
00117   $r = array();
00118   foreach($data as $k => $v) {
00119    
00120    // if the field given has no formatter, then we can passthru
00121    if(!isset($this->format[$k])) {
00122     $r[$k] = $v;
00123     continue;
00124    }
00125    
00126    // we dont want to change the class
00127    $t = $this->format[$k];
00128    
00129    // process date, time and timestamp
00130    if(in_array($t['type'], array('date', 'time', 'timestamp'))) {
00131     // epoch seconds
00132     if(is_numeric($v)) {
00133      $r[$k] = @date($t['date'], $v);
00134      continue;
00135     }
00136     
00137     // textual date
00138     $r[$k] = @date($t['date'], @strtotime($v));
00139     continue;
00140    }
00141    
00142    // process number or bytes
00143    if($t['type'] == 'number' || $t['type'] == 'bytes') {
00144     
00145     if($t['fixed'] !== false) {
00146      if($t['type'] == 'bytes')
00147       $t['prec'] = $t['fixed'] = max($t['prec'], $t['fixed']);
00148      else $t['prec'] = $t['fixed'] = min($t['prec'], $t['fixed']);
00149     }
00150     
00151     // mul
00152     $v *= $t['mul'];
00153     
00154     // format bytes
00155     if($t['type'] == 'bytes') {
00156      if($v == "")
00157       $v = 0;
00158       
00159      $p = explode(';', $t['sizes']);
00160      $found = false;
00161      for($i = 0; $i < count($p); ++$i) {
00162       if($v < pow($t['unit'], $i)) {
00163        $v /= pow($t['unit'], $i - 1);
00164        $v = round($v, $t['prec'] + 1);
00165        $t['post'] = $p[$i - 1] . $t['post'];
00166        $found = true;
00167        break;
00168       }
00169      }
00170      
00171      // its over the largest unit
00172      if(!$found) {
00173       $v /= pow($t['unit'], count($p) - 1);
00174       $v = round($v, $t['prec'] + 1);
00175       $t['post'] = $p[count($p) - 1] . $t[post];
00176      }
00177     }
00178     
00179     // correct the fixed
00180     if($t['fixed'] === false) {
00181      if(round($v, $t['prec']) == intval($v))
00182       $t['fixed'] = 0;
00183      else if(strpos($v, '.') !== false)
00184       $t['fixed'] = strlen($v) - strpos($v, '.') - 2;
00185      else $t['fixed'] = 0;
00186     }
00187     
00188     // the rest
00189     $v = number_format(round($v, $t['prec']), $t['fixed'], $t['dec'], $t['thousands']);
00190     $r[$k] = $t['pre'] . $v . $t['post'];
00191     continue;
00192    }
00193    
00194    // process boolean
00195    if($t['type'] == 'boolean') {
00196     $r[$k] = $v;
00197     continue;
00198    }
00199    
00200    // process string
00201    if($t['type'] == 'string') {
00202     $r[$k] = $v;
00203     continue;
00204    }
00205    
00206   }
00207   
00208   if($returnArray)
00209    return $r;
00210   return $r[0];
00211  }
00212  
00216  public function __toString() {
00217   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00218  }
00219  
00220 }
